pages.text: 33|63|Zhongren wen ni fuhuo shi zai shenme shihou? Ni shuo:“Na zhiyou an la cai zhidao.” Shenme shi ni zhidao ta he shi fasheng ne? Fuhuo shi, huoxu shi hen jin de.
33|64|An la que yi qi jue bu xindao zhe, bing wei tamen yubei liehuo
33|65|tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, buneng dedao renhe baohu zhe, ye buneng dedao renhe yuanzhu zhe.
33|66|Tamen de mianpi zai huo zhong bei fanzhuan zhi ri, tamen jiang shuo:“Dan yuan women ceng fucong an la, fucong shizhe!”
33|67|Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women que yi fucong women de lingxiu he women de weiren, shi tamen shi women weibei zhengdao.
33|68|Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yong jiabei de xingfa chuzhi tamen, qiu ni yanli de qi jue tamen.”
33|69|Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao fangxiao yuan wu mu sa de renmen. An la yi wei ta xi xueyuan wu, ju an la kan lai, ta shi you mianzi de.
33|70|Xinshimen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang shuo zheng hua.
33|71|Ta jiu gaishan nimen de xingwei, jiu she you nimen de zuiguo. Fucong an la ji qi shizhe de ren, que yi huode weida de chenggong.
33|72|Wo que yi jiang zhongren xintuo tiandi he shanyue, dan tamen bu ken chengdan ta, tamen weiju ta, er ren que chengdanle——ren que shi bu yi de, que shi wuzhi de,
33|73|yizhi an la chengfa wei xin de nannu he yi wu pei zhu de nannu, er she you xindao de nannu! An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
